alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 11:52PM CDT until June 01 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL FOARD AND SOUTHEASTERN HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 1152 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Medicine Mound, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Medicine Mound and Rayland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
